parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the task ends. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **20**

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the task starts. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the task. Valid values:

*   **1**: The task is running.
*   **2**: The task is successful.
*   **3**: The task failed.
